ComicInfo.Summary:
Dredd Launches - East-Meg One disappears! and Dredd orders surrender.
Stopping the Filth Columnist too late Rogue and Sister Sledge unsuccessfully attempt to save Dix-I, but the Filth Columnists were too far ahead.
